parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns the group leader for the given unit or group. For dead units, objNull is returned.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Object]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''leader''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value>unitName: [[Object]] or [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value><code>[[leader]] [[group]] [[player]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[leader]] [[player]] </code>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value><code>_GroupLeader <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[leader]] ([[group]] ([[vehicle]] [[player]])) </code>

</value></part><part><name>x3 </name>=<value><code>_UnitLeader <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[leader]] [[player]] </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[formationLeader]], [[formLeader]], [[isFormationLeader]], [[selectLeader]]
</value></part></template>
